bordered.description: Whether or not to display borders

colon.description: Configure the default value for 'colon' for 'Descriptions.Item'. Indicates whether to display a colon after the label
colon.description_zh: 配置 `Descriptions.Item` 的 `colon` 的默认值。表示是否显示 label 后面的冒号

:column.description: The number of 'DescriptionItems' in a row, which can be written as pixel values or as responsive objects '{ xs: 8, sm: 16, md: 24}'
:column.description_zh: 一行的 `DescriptionItems` 数量，可以写成像素值或支持响应式的对象写法 `{ xs: 8, sm: 16, md: 24}`

:contentStyle.description: Customize content styles, please use 'styles={{ content: {} }}' instead
:contentStyle.description_zh: 自定义内容样式，请使用 `styles={{ content: {} }}` 替换

:extra.description: Describes the action area of the list, which is displayed in the upper right
:extra.description_zh: 描述列表的操作区域，显示在右上方

:labelStyle.description: Customize label styles, please use 'styles={{ label: {} }}' instead
:labelStyle.description_zh: 自定义标签样式，请使用 `styles={{ label: {} }}` 替换

size.description: Set the size of the list. Can be set to 'middle', small, or left blank (only 'bordered={true}' will work)
size.description_zh: 设置列表的大小。可以设置为 `middle` 、small, 或不填（只有设置 `bordered={true}` 生效）

:title.description: A title that describes the list, appearing at the very top
:title.description_zh: 描述列表的标题，显示在最顶部

rootClassName.description: className added to the outermost layer of the component
rootClassName.description_zh: 添加在组件最外层的 className
